Package com.esri.mo2.data.qb

Supporting classes for parsing and building query expressions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
NumericFieldListener This interface defines a listener for a feature class having numeric field(s).
PreParser The classes that implement this interface can be used to preparse a where-clause via the QueryEnvironment's preparse method.
WhereClauseExaminer This interface determines if a Row passes a where-clause acceptance test.
 

Class Summary
BasePreParser This class is a basic implementation of a PreParser and can be used to replace TimeStamps with a date string produced by the com.esri.mo2.util.Date.toString method.
NumericFieldEvent This class informs a listener(s) that there has been a change in state of numeric field(s) in the source.
QTreeNode This class adds two methods to get/set the nodeType for parsing the query tokens.
QueryEnvironment This class provides the following utility methods.
 

Exception Summary
QBException A base class for exceptions thrown within QueryEnvironment.
QCompileException A base class for exceptions thrown when a compiling error is found while compiling an expression tree in QueryEnvironment for use with a Table.
QSyntaxException A base class for exceptions thrown when a syntax error is found while constructing an expression tree within the QueryEnvironment class.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.data.qb Description

Supporting classes for parsing and building query expressions. Mostly these are used by the QueryBuilder and Table implementations.
